snippet: Union Rags showed he had what it took for the Kentucky Derby in a win last August and a loss in November.
abstract: Joe Drape On Horse Racing column picks Union Rags to win the Kentucky Derby. Photo, Chart (M)
lead_paragraph: LOUISVILLE, Ky. It was one of those soggy Saratoga afternoons last August, with rain beating on the red and white awnings and sending railbirds for cover under the eaves of the betting windows. The feature that day was for 2-year-old colts going six and a half furlongs, and in the paddock Union Rags let the water bead on him without flinching.

headline.main: A Derby Pick, Forged In the Rain at Saratoga
